text: Coping mechanismsTW sh I relasped after being about seven months clean from self harm a little while ago  and my medications make it so that I don t really have the urge to do it again  but I really want to at the same time  It s hard to explain  sorry if I m not making sense  I felt and still feel bad about it  but I can t go back and undo it obviously What I need is coping mechanisms  What I do right now to curb my depression is listen to music and watch art compilations on YouTube or other videos I enjoy  draw  read  and talk to friends  Also do my makeup  But I only see my friends when we have calls  which is almost never now  and I see one at school sometimes but we don t ever get to talk really  Everyone I considered friends last school year never talk to me and just ignore me now  I m tryig my best to make new friends but it s so hard  especially because I m painfully shy My bad coping mechanisms are self harm  of course  and adult content which makes me feel disgusted but I ve become addicted after watching it for the past year  I hate watching it but I can t stop  I know it s stupid and pathetic  I just don t know how to stop I guess  Also negative self talk  I learned about positive self talk and postive affirmations from therapy last year but whenever I said nice things to myself in the mirror I d just start whispering to my reflection how much I hated her and all these awful things  I m constantly saying awful things to myself in my head  It doesn t work for me Neither do breathing exercises  whenever I try to control my breathing I start not being able to breathe Sorry this is so long  I just want some advice on coping mechanisms I can use  What do you guys do to distract yourself or make yourself feel better when you re down  Any comments would be greatly appreciated

text: All alone with no where to goMy life has crashed completely   I just flunked out of college  and my girlfriend left me for another man yesterday  saying I  didn t make her happy like he did   She is the only person I have ever truly loved  and I don t have another way to meet people   I spent all my energy and money trying to make her happy  and now that she s gone  I can t find another reason to go on   She was my entire reason to live  to work  to keep trying  and now I found out that all I was to her was someone to talk to who could give her orgasms   I don t want to hurt anymore   I ve been hospitalized  and I feel like the only thing stopping me from killing myself is the fact that I would hurt the people I care about if I did   I know that won t last   All I see is an endless hell ahead of me until death  and I don t see why I should continue   Every day is a waste   I m told this will help me feel better  but I don t know what to do
summary: Girlfriend left him for another man yesterday. He has been hospitalized. He doesn't know what to do. He wants to kill himself, but he doesn't want to hurt the people he cares about. He is afraid he would hurt them if he did.

text: Why are you alive A question I ask myself a million times a day  What makes other people live I m not actively suicidal but I have no reason to live  not even one My family and friends  not that I have friends  don t matter because one day they ll see me die  So why not now Happiness doesn t matter  pleasure in life doesn t matter because it doesn t last  So why should I live Sorting out the problems in my life makes no difference because if I do end up sorting them out I ll die and if I don t I ll still die  so it s all pointless So why does it matter  Why does life matter  Why should I get through all of this just to get to the same outcome of death each time  I don t know my answer But why do you
